# Cranberry Bread

## Ingredients

* 2 cups sifted flour
* 1 cup sugar
* 1.5 tsp baking powder
* 1 tsp salt
* 0.75 cup orange juice
* 0.5 tsp baking soda
* 0.25 cup margarine
* 1 egg
* 1 tsp grated orange peal
* 3 cups whole cranberries (or 1/5 cup cranberries and 1/2 cup rasns or other dried frut)

## Instructions

Sift flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and baking soda. Cut in magraine and add eg, orange peel, and juice. Stir. Fold in cranberries an spoon into a greased 9x5x3 inch baking pan. Bake at 350&deg;F for 1 hour and 10 minutes.
